mapper.select: select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt, authority FROM stbl ORDER by sno desc
mapper.insert: insert into stbl(title, writer, postpassword, content, authority) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{postpassword}, #{content}, #{authority})
insert into comment_table(postNum, writer, commentPassword, commentContent, authority) values(#{postNum}, #{writer}, #{commentPassword}, #{commentContent}, #{authority})
mapper.delete: delete from comment_table WHERE postNum=#{postNum} and commentNum=#{commentNum}
mapper.update: update stbl SET title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, postpassword=#{postpassword}, writingtime=NOW(), content=#{content} WHERE sno=#{sno}
update stbl set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 WHERE sno=#{sno}
mapper.select: select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl WHERE title LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER by sno desc
select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl WHERE content LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER by sno desc
select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl WHERE writer LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER by sno desc
select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl WHERE title LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') or content LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER by sno desc
